LanguageData.Apparel_AirwireHeadset.label: 에어와이어 헤드셋
LanguageData.Apparel_AirwireHeadset.description: A simple head-mounted comms computer that slightly enhances a mechanitor's control bandwidth. This allows them to control more mechs.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetMechCommander.label: 기계사령관 헬멧
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetMechCommander.descrip: A plasteel-weave combat helmet designed for battle mechanitors. It is embedded with computers and signal enhancers that moderately increase the wearer's maximum control bandwidth. This allows the mechanitor to control more mechs.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetMechlordHelmet.label: 기계군주 헬멧
LanguageData.Apparel_ArmorHelmetMechlordHelmet.descri: 기계식 보조 장비가 장착된 두꺼운 플라스틸 직조 헬멧입니다. 기계군주 헬멧은 메카니터의 대역폭을 크게 증폭시키지만, 전용 중장갑보다 방어도가 다소 떨어집니다.
LanguageData.Apparel_ArrayHeadset.label: 통신배열 헤드셋
LanguageData.Apparel_ArrayHeadset.description: A head-mounted computer and signaling array that enhances a mechanitor's control bandwidth. This allows them to control more mechs.
LanguageData.Apparel_ClothMask.label: 마스크
LanguageData.Apparel_ClothMask.description: A piece of fabric which covers the wearer's mouth and nose with several layers of textile. It is remarkably effective in reducing the effects of environmental toxins.
LanguageData.Apparel_GasMask.label: 방독면
LanguageData.Apparel_GasMask.description: A flexible mask worn over the face with an embedded air filter. It dramatically reduces exposure to pollution through the lungs, but does not protect the skin on the rest of the body.\n\nIt prevents tox gas irritants from entering through the eyes and mouth.
LanguageData.Apparel_IntegratorHeadset.label: 통합자 헤드셋
LanguageData.Apparel_IntegratorHeadset.description: An advanced head-mounted computer and signaling array that dramatically enhances a mechanitor's control bandwidth. This allows the wearer to control many more mechanoids at once.
